original_text: And they were all amazed and said to one another, “What is this word? For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits, and they come out!”
korean_text: 다 놀라 서로 말하여 이르되 이 어떠한 말씀인고 권위와 능력으로 더러운 귀신을 명하매 나가는도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 권위와 능력으로 더러운 영들을 명령하니
